title: New runes, out of combat movement speed
body:
I'm a kindred main and I absolutely love playing her. 
Recently I have been running the wanderer mastery to give me 3% out of combat movement speed because frankly kindreds low base movement speed drives me crazy. 

Anyway I was wondering if anyone has heard of any new runes will be adding out of combat movement speed.

replies.body: I may be wrong, but I believe one of the 3 "hunter" runes replacing bounty hunter mastery provides out of combat movespeed.
